code: import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{SunIcon,SparklesIcon,HomeIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GardenSection=()=>{const features=[{icon:SunIcon,text:'Atmosferă relaxantă'},{icon:HomeIcon,text:'Decor natural, înconjurat de flori și vegetație'},{icon:SparklesIcon,text:'Potrivit pentru mic dejun, prânz și cină'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"section-padding bg-background-secondary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-custom grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-12 items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{initial:{opacity:0,x:-30},whileInView:{opacity:1,x:0},viewport:{once:true},transition:{duration:0.8},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl md:text-4xl font-display font-bold text-text-primary mb-4",children:"Gr\u0103dina de var\u0103"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg text-text-light mb-6",children:"Spa\u021Biu verde, umbros \u0219i lini\u0219tit, ideal pentru mese \xEEn aer liber \xEEn sezonul cald."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"space-y-3 mb-6",children:features.map((f,idx)=>{const Icon=f.icon;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"flex items-center space-x-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"inline-flex items-center justify-center w-8 h-8 bg-primary-100 rounded-full",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{className:"w-5 h-5 text-primary-500"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-text-secondary",children:f.text})]},idx);})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{initial:{opacity:0,x:30},whileInView:{opacity:1,x:0},viewport:{once:true},transition:{duration:0.8},className:"relative",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1464983953574-0892a716854b?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=80",alt:"Gr\u0103dina de var\u0103 Hotel Marami",className:"rounded-xl shadow-lg w-full h-80 object-cover",loading:"lazy"})})]})});};export default GardenSection;
